text: A punching bag is a tough bag which is supposed to be punched a lot. It is used in exercise or stress relief to improve one of three areas: physical strength, aerobic fitness or punching technique. ==History== Punching bags have been used in martial arts for as long as there has been a written history of military training. Similar apparatus in Asian martial arts include the Okinawan makiwara and the Chinese mook jong, which may have padded striking surfaces attached to them. ==Related pages== *Boxing *Jujutsu *Karate *Kung Fu *Taekwondo ==References== Category:Sports equipment Category:Martial arts
